ygData.subject: Re: TWINKING-- a discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: You want soap opera, see the Los Angeles Times from last week (Tuesday, 4/24, perhaps? Their site is down right now, so I can t search.) (Heads are rolling,
ygData.messageBody:
You want soap opera, see the Los Angeles Times
from last week (Tuesday, 4/24, perhaps? Their site is
down right now, so I can't search.) (Heads are
rolling, I'm sure). Anyway, they evidently sent someone to
the Fan Faire, and published an article on in-game
marriages -- one woman married someone in-game . . . but
she's married to a different person in RL (who doesn't
play EQ, I think). The guy says he's "OK with it" --
though it was weird at first, but the guy (in-game
husband) seems like a nice guy . . . <br><br><SNIP>
<br><br>That would be the sound of my privates getting cut off
by my wife if I ever "married" someone in-game. I
think it's kind of strange, too.<br><br>I'm gonna have
to go to EC (is that East Commons?) and see what all
the fuss is about. I bought my Dwarven ring mail in
Kelethin, and that place seems like an auction zoo
sometimes.<br><br>Kharlisht of Kaladim<br>10th season Rogue<br>Drinal
